scripts.unlink-docs-component: cd ../next-product-docs && npm unlink && cd ./node_modules/react && npm unlink && cd ../react-dom && npm unlink
scripts.create-links: cd ../next-product-docs && npm link && cd ./node_modules/react && npm link && cd ../react-dom && npm link && cd ../../../docs
scripts.link-component-to-folder: npm link react && npm link react-dom && npm link @opstrace/next-product-docs
scripts.link-docs-component: npm run create-links && npm run link-component-to-folder --force
